ch.unifr.pai.twice.dragndrop.client.configuration
Class DragConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.dragndrop.client.configuration.DragConfiguration

public class DragConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

This configures the way how a drag can be visualized and restricted.

Author:
Oliver Schmid

Field Summary
private  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget boundaryBox
          A boundary box.
private  com.google.gwt.user.client.Element dragProxy
          A HTML representation of the drag proxy (the semi-transparent visualization of a currently dragged widget)
private  DragNDropHandler handler
          The drag and drop handler to be used to react on drag events
private  boolean withProxy
          If a drag proxy shall be used

A boundary box. A dragged widget can not leave this widget

Method Detail

withoutProxy

public static DragConfiguration withoutProxy()
Returns:
a default configuration without a drag proxy - the widget will be dragged itself (it does therefore not remain in its original position)

withProxy

public static DragConfiguration withProxy()
Returns:
a default configuration with a drag proxy

withoutProxy

public static DragConfiguration withoutProxy(DragNDropHandler handler)
Parameters:
handler -
Returns:
a default configuration with a custom DragNDropHandler without a drag proxy - the widget will be dragged itself (it does therefore not remain in its original position)

getDragNDropHandler

public DragNDropHandler getDragNDropHandler()
Returns:
the assigned drag and drop handler

getMinX

public int getMinX()
Returns:
the boundaries of permitted drags - if no boundary box is provided, this is 0

getMaxX

public int getMaxX()
Returns:
the boundaries of permitted drags - if no boundary box is provided, this equals to the client width

getMinY

public int getMinY()
Returns:
the boundaries of permitted drags - if no boundary box is provided, this is 0

getMaxY

public int getMaxY()
Returns:
the boundaries of permitted drags - if no boundary box is provided, this equals to the client height

isWithProxy

public boolean isWithProxy()
Returns:
if this drag configuration contains a proxy
